Product_Name: Amazon Fire TV Stick Lite with 2-Year Protection Plan
AI_Text: Customers like the ease of installation using the Firestick. They say it's easy to set up and use. They appreciate the value for money, saying it'd be a great investment for streaming. Customers like that it works great for streaming and that it'll attach immediately. They do, however, have concerns about the volume control. Customers are mixed on buffering.
Description: Protection Plan covers product breakdowns during normal use, plus mechanical and electrical failures. Includes 24/7 support and 2-day replacements.
Press and ask Alexa - Use your voice to easily search and launch shows across multiple apps.
Live TV - Watch your favorite live TV, news, and sports with subscriptions to SLING TV, YouTube TV, and others.
Your Protection Plan will be delivered via e-mail within 24 hours.
Your Protection Plan has no deductibles or shipping fees. Cancel anytime, full refund in the first 90 days.
Endless entertainment - Stream more than 1.5 million movies and TV episodes from Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Peacock, and more, plus listen to millions of songs. Subscription fees may apply.
This bundle includes a Fire TV Stick Lite and 2-year Protection Plan.
